plot: Artist John Kilduff shares the joy of painting in as many ways as possible, encouraging his viewers to get into their art... no mater their age, their gender, or their profession. It's all about "throwing some paint on the canvas".
title: Let's Paint TV
plot_es: Artist John Kilduff shares the joy of painting in as many ways as possible, encouraging his viewers to get into their art... no mater their age, their gender, or their profession. It's all about "throwing some paint on the canvas".
plot_en: Artist John Kilduff shares the joy of painting in as many ways as possible, encouraging his viewers to get into their art... no mater their age, their gender, or their profession. It's all about "throwing some paint on the canvas".
